code: import'./Profile.css';import React,{useContext,useEffect}from"react";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import{userData}from"../../http/userAPI";import{UserContext}from"../../providers/UserProvider";import{observer}from"mobx-react";import{SERVER_API}from"../../utils/consts";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import Menu from'../../components/Menu/Menu';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Profile=observer(()=>{const{userStore}=useContext(UserContext);const[translation]=useTranslation();const params=useParams();useEffect(()=>{userData(params.nickname).then(data=>{userStore.setProfileData(data);userStore.setProfileUrl(params.nickname);});},[userStore,params.nickname]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Menu,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile__content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"profile__content--logo",src:SERVER_API+"/"+userStore.profileData.photo,alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"profile__content--button",children:translation("profile.edit")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile__content--name",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:userStore.profileData.firstname}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:userStore.profileData.lastname})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile__content--nickname",children:userStore.profileData.nickname}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile__content--gender",children:userStore.profileData.gender}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile__content--status",children:userStore.profileData.status})]})]})});});export default Profile;
